title: Pool Party Rewards Distribution [COMPLETE]
body:
Hello everyone,

Mystery Champion rewards are still in the process of distribution for all Riot Regions. There is no specific ETA as to when it will be completed, but we will update this once it has finished!

I will update this thread when the rollout is complete.

-Riot Cochese

**EDIT:** see first comment below

replies.body:
All rewards have now been released. 

If you: 

* Won a premade 5
* Linked your account via facebook, for the duration of the specified time frame 
* and were on good behaviour

Then you will now have your gift, added to your account.

For anyone that feels they should have been granted a gift, please submit a Player Support Ticket [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and our team will investigate.
Hi have not recieved my mystery champ, are you still rolling it out?

> [{quoted}](name=LeglessTheCow,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=gPG5xqEN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-02T23:43:33.036+0000)
>
> Hi have not recieved my mystery champ, are you still rolling it out?

It is still rolling out, sorry it's taking so long and for any confusion with your rewards.
thats good to know thought i wasnt gonna get it cause my friends have recieved them, thanks for the reply a little bit of piece of mind goes along way
Hi there, i posted a ticket last night and it has just passed 25hours - what would be the normal response time?

> [{quoted}](name=ViktorVonBadmeme,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=gPG5xqEN,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-04T07:50:14.009+0000)
>
> Hi there, i posted a ticket last night and it has just passed 25hours - what would be the normal response time?

Looked this up for you mate, and seems the Player Support agent has been in contact. Hope to have this resolved soon and sorry for the delays.
i submitted a ticket 9 hours ago, how long does this usally take

> [{quoted}](name=LeglessTheCow,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=gPG5xqEN,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-07-03T09:07:04.445+0000)
>
> i submitted a ticket 9 hours ago, how long does this usally take

You should get a response within 24 hours.
i never got my mystery champ. Why not :(?

> [{quoted}](name=robohobo98,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=gPG5xqEN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-03T05:34:00.676+0000)
>
> i never got my mystery champ. Why not :(?

Please submit a Player Support ticket if you feel this was a mistake and our team will get you sorted.
